column6: musician and photographer. He is best well known for having played the character ''Mr. Spock'' in the Star Trek series and films.

column1: He recorded "''[[The Ballad of Bilbo Baggins]]''" as part of his 1968 ''Two Sides of Leonard Nimoy'' album
column2: recount the storyline of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' in two minutes. The ballad's music video became a minor Internet meme in the early 2000s when [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' movies]] were released.
